Advances the iterator.

@1@ Pre-increment. Returns the updated iterator. 

@2@ Post-increment. Returns the old value of the iterator. 

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|*this}}

@2@ The old value of the iterator.
